Role_Desc: Person/Pool-ID from production department at Daimler Truck. On applying for the functional role, the user should automatically receive Production permission for all the Cebid ECUs, After-Sales STANDARD Certificates as Standard Permissions.
Reason_for_internal_FR: Functional role request for Bus Production Tool Development

Role_Desc: Person/Pool-ID in the development department at Daimler Truck. Info: it does not automatically mean that this person works in the development team for the related ECU project, but this could be possible. On applying for the functional role, the user should automatically receive After-Sales ENHANCED for all the Cebid ECU's, After-Sales STANDARD Certificates as Standard Permissions.

Person/Pool-ID in the development department at Daimler Truck. Person/Pool-ID who is working in the quality department at Daimler Truck. The QM department receives failed parts from the field for first. On applying for the functional role, the user should automatically receive After-Sales STANDARD Certificate as Standard Permission.

Person/Pool-ID from vehicle testing department at Daimler Truck. On applying for the functional role, the user should automatically receive After-Sales ENHANCED for all the Cebid ECU's, After-Sales STANDARD Certificates as Standard Permissions.

Role_Desc: Person/Pool-ID who is working in the After sales/workshops for Daimler Truck. On applying for the functional role, the user should automatically receive After-Sales ENHANCED for all the Cebid ECU's, After-Sales STANDARD, After-Sales BASIC, EPTI Certificates as Standard Permissions.
Reason_for_internal_FR: Functional role request for Xentry Tool Development

Role_Desc: Person/Pool-ID in the development department, associated with ATG project at Daimler Truck. Info: it does not automatically mean that this person works in the development team for the related AP4 ECU project, but this could be possible. On applying for the functional role, the user should automatically receive After-Sales ENHANCED as Standard Permissions.
Reason_for_internal_FR: Functional role request for Development - ATG

Role_Desc: Person/Pool-ID from an external service provider, who supports the Daimler Truck development department. This service provided is conducted by Daimler Truck. This is not the ECU supplier. On applying for the functional role, the user should automatically receive After-Sales ENHANCED for all the Cebid ECU's, After-Sales STANDARD Certificates as Standard Permissions.
Reason_for_External_FR: Functional role request for Development External Support

Role_Desc: Person at the ECU supplier who is responsible for managing keys at the supplier side for the related ECU project.
